metadata.title: CVE-2016-6891 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: MatrixSSL before 3.8.6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds read) via a crafted ASN.1 Bit Field primitive in an X.509certificate.

criterions.comment: matrixssl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
